Posts.Content: May 7, 2013 02:58PM IckyStickyBee wrote: I'm so sorry for your loss, Paul.  I'm new to this forum as my family member was just recently diagnosed with stage 4 bc, so I'm kind of still in shock right now learning about all this...your post made me cry.  I'm sure your mother felt surrounded by your love and by your father's love when she passed. My deepest condolences.
Posts.Title: {{{ Sandy is an Angel }}} PaulAndSandy justjudie
